column4: If I'm using Virtualbox and running Ubuntu as a guest to Vista which is the host, can any virus, spyware, keylogger, trojan etc infect Ubuntu from Vista or vice versa? Can a Microsoft Vista windows virus, spyware, keylogger, trojan etc infect Ubuntu and become active on Ubuntu? And vice versa?
If you're saving things in a common place and you d/l a virus in an email or vb macro for instance, you can infect windows from inside ubuntu. but not the other way around
